title: Spark Plugs - Check/Renew

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Detach the electrical connections from the ignition coils.
Remove the ignition coils form the cylinder head.
Using a suitable tool remove the spark plugs from the cylinder head.
Check the condition of the spark plug cap seal for wear and/or damage. Replace as necessary.
Check for signs of abnormal discolouration or deposits (see
Check and if necessary adjust the spark plug gap to
Refit the spark plugs or, if required, fit new spark plugs and tighten to
Inspect the ignition coils seal for damage and replace if necessary.
Refit the ignition coils and reconnect the ignition coils electrical connections.
